body: Tests failed due to a missing `jsonb` field type. I believe we need to be explicit about using Postgres 9.4 in our `.travis.yml`: https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/using-postgresql/#Selecting-a-PostgreSQL-Version
body_text: Tests failed due to a missing jsonb field type. I believe we need to be explicit about using Postgres 9.4 in our .travis.yml: https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/using-postgresql/#Selecting-a-PostgreSQL-Version
body_html: Tests failed due to a missing jsonb field type. I believe we need to be explicit about using Postgres 9.4 in our .travis.yml: https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/using-postgresql/#Selecting-a-PostgreSQL-Version
